name: bun-profiler
description: Continuous CPU profiling for Bun (JavaScriptCore) via Pyroscope/Grafana ingest â€” zero native dependencies

scripts.build: bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile ./dist/index.js --format esm --target node --external node:inspector --external node:os --external node:zlib --external node:util
scripts.build:cjs: bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile ./dist/index.cjs --format cjs --target node --external node:inspector --external node:os --external node:zlib --external node:util
scripts.l: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun test
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run l
